about.summary: Passionate and dedicated Software Developer with a solid foundation in software development, algorithms, data structures, and computer systems. Eager to apply academic knowledge and hands-on project experience to deliver impactful solutions in a dynamic IT environment.

About.title: About Me
About.description: Discover my journey, education, and passion for technology and quality assurance

story.title: My Story & Background
paragraphs: I am a passionate and detail-oriented software developer with a strong academic foundation in Computer Science. My journey in technology has been driven by curiosity, continuous learning, and a desire to create meaningful digital solutions that make a difference.

With expertise in both frontend and backend development, I specialize in creating robust web applications using modern technologies. My academic projects, including the Face Recognition Attendance System, demonstrate my ability to handle full-stack development challenges and deliver quality software solutions.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: An Autonomous Institution Affiliated to Bharathiar University. Focusing on advanced computer science concepts, software engineering principles, and modern development methodologies.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.institution: Bishop Appasamy College of Arts and Science - Coimbatore
education.description: Affiliated by Bharathiar University. Built a strong foundation in programming, database management, web development, and software engineering principles.
